Title: The Lord of War and Thunder
Plot: Raylan's father is arrested in the wake of a confrontation with the tenant of a house he and Raylan's stepmother own.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Linda Gehringer, Rick Gomez, Eddie Jemison, Brent Sexton, Karina Logue, David Meunier, Raymond J. Barry
